## Source: amazon-inspector (8d196800be4de842ce4eb526181a86b7d78e5e3851954256a68d9cda3dab4a89)
The package myads-layout was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (daaebe7963626ff1bbd9c1182c246f9c508f6f3b7add576234dc5b4651276b24)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'myads-layout' @ 6.5.5 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
